text: are y’all ok with getting rid of the old cuisinart coffee machine and the espresso machine?
the espresso machine literally hasnt been used in years
the espresso machine apparently doesn’t work. We were hoping to find who it belongs to as no one I’ve asked seems to know.
it was here when i started
that’s the same thing everyone has said, but no one knows
we should probably just donate it or toss it if it doesnt work
that was the plan. I found a place that accepts electronic donations, but as it’s a spendy item, I thought someone might want to try and fix it first
k- i added that it’s broken in the spreadsheet

hey, so I was able to get some sample plates from Rose’s to take a look at (it’s always helpful to actually see things in person). Do you guys want to meet tomorrow to take a look, or just swing by my desk now?
should probably meet up this week anyway, but I’m gonna swing by :slightly_smiling_face:
something like this is a little cheaper, though the bowls are probably smaller than we’d like <http://www.corelle.com/livingware-winter-frost-white-18-pc-dinnerware-set/1088609.html#start=17>
